objective_summary: The main research objective of Kim et al. (2010) is to study Methylosinus trichosporium OB3b, a methanotrophic bacterium, and its ability to convert methane to methanol and further to formaldehyde. The researchers developed a novel compulsory circulation diffusion system for cell cultivation and used a methane/air mixture in a nitrate mineral salt culture medium under specific conditions.
title: Kim et al. 2010
